product_overview: SmartFacade360 is a cutting-edge architectural visualization platform that enables immersive 3D interaction with building facades, real-time material customization, environmental impact analytics, and augmented reality visualization, all integrated within a secure and user-friendly web interface.
core_goals: Provide high-fidelity 3D orbital visualization of architectural facades with precise user controls.
Enable seamless real-time customization of facade materials from a live connected database.
Deliver live eco-sustainability impact analytics to support data-driven decision making.
Facilitate augmented reality experiences for context-aware visualization of architectural models in real environments.
Securely manage and store user assets including 3D models and session data, ensuring privacy and integrity.
Support detailed technical specification display for advanced material validation and selection.
key_features: Interactive 3D Facade Visualization with full 360Â° orbital camera, zoom, and panning controls.
Dynamic Material Picker connected to Supabase for instant texture and shader updates without page reloads.
Eco-Calculator Dashboard displaying real-time KPIs such as Carbon Footprint, Thermal Conductivity, and Sustainability Score with comparative analysis against reference facades.
AR Quick-Look Module using WebXR and model-viewer for real-world scaled projection with tactile gestures and shadow effects.
Tech Specs Viewer presenting detailed metadata on selected materials including technology transfer summaries, patents, and certifications.
Secure Asset Management backend using Supabase storage buckets with Role Level Security and time-limited signed URLs for intellectual property protection.
Telemetry Logging of user interactions such as material selection and AR activation for validation and analytics.
Support for uploading local 3D model files (.obj) for visualization within the 3D viewer.
user_flow_summary: User logs in and accesses their personalized project dashboard.
User uploads or selects a 3D architectural facade model for inspection.
User interacts with the 3D viewport to orbit, zoom, and pan around the model for detailed examination.
User selects facade components via interactive hover and click to customize materials.
Upon material selection, the system updates the 3D model textures in real time and refreshes analytics data.
User views updated eco-sustainability impact metrics on the dashboard reflecting material changes.
User explores detailed technical specs for selected materials to validate choices.
User activates the AR Quick-Look to project the model into their real environment using a mobile device camera.
User session and customization data are securely saved and can be retrieved on return visits.
Telemetry events of user actions are logged for further analysis and quality assurance.
validation_criteria: 3D viewer supports smooth and precise orbital controls with no rendering glitches.
Material changes occur instantaneously with no page reloads and sync correctly with analytics dashboard.
Eco-Calculator accurately recalculates KPIs and updates visualizations on material changes.
AR functionality activates camera, detects planes, and allows manipulation of the model with responsive touch gestures.
Tech Specs Viewer shows accurate and comprehensive metadata consistent with database entries.
File upload mechanism accepts .obj files and renders them correctly in the viewer.
User authentication securely links user profiles to saved sessions and projects.
All user interactions are properly logged in Supabase for telemetry with no data loss.
Assets are stored securely with proper access control and URLs expire as intended to protect IP.
